entity.name: user
entity.sql: select * from (SELECT user.* FROM user ) as a

entity.name: activity
entity.sql: select * from (SELECT activity.*\,account.id as account_name from activity left join contact on contact.id = activity.contact_id left join account on account.id = contact.account_id ) as a

entity.name: opportunityuserteam
entity.sql: select * from (select user.id as user_id \,opportunityuserteam.id\,user.job_title\,opportunity.id as opportunity_id \, user.office_tel\,user.telephone\,opportunityuserteam.team_role from opportunityuserteam left join user on user.id = opportunityuserteam.user_id left join opportunity on opportunity.id = opportunityuserteam.opportunity_id ) as a
entity.sql-ent: select * from (select user.id as user_id \,opportunityuserteam.id\,user.job_title\,opportunity.id as opportunity_id \, user.office_tel\,user.telephone\,opportunityuserteam.team_role from opportunityuserteam left join user on user.id = opportunityuserteam.user_id left join opportunity on opportunity.id = opportunityuserteam.opportunity_id where opportunityuserteam.id = ? ) as a
